name: Dragonpath
description: Dragonpath is a top-down hack'n'slash RPG with abilities tied to equipment rather than classes. Carve a bloody path through a broken underground realm inhabited by vicious monsters and few struggling remnants of civilization. Experiment with equipment to find the combination that suits your playstyle best!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista+ Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 540 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: 720p
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 650 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
